ARABIC: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: How can they expect a Reminder when a clear Messenger has already come to them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How can a warning benefit them? The Apostle who explained all things clearly had come to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But how will they take heed? Such are they that a Messenger came to them clearly expounding the Truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: How could this punishment bring them to their senses when a Messenger evidently had come to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: How is it possible for them to accept guidance, whereas a Noble Messenger who speaks clearly has already come to them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: How can there be for them an admonition, when a Messenger explaining things clearly has already come to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: How shall they be reminded, and there came to them an Apostle making clear (the truth),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: How should they have the Reminder, seeing a clear Messenger already came to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: How can there be remembrance for them, when a messenger making plain (the Truth) had already come unto them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: How can they benefit from admonition, seeing that a messenger had already come to them explaining things clearly?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: How can there be an admonition Unto them, when surely there came Unto them an apostle manifest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: What will the admonition avail them, when a manifest apostle had already come to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: How shall the message be (effectual) for them, seeing that an Messenger explaining things clearly has (already) come to them,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: How can there be for them an admonition (at the time when the torment has reached them), when a Messenger explaining things clearly has already come to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But how will they avail themselves of the Reminder, when a clear Messenger had already come to them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But how can they be reminded? An enlightening messenger has already come to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:13] God, exalted be He, says: How can there be a reminder for them, that is to say, faith will not benefit them once the chastisement has been sent down, when already there has come to them a manifest Messenger, whose Message is plain [to understand],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (How can there be remembrance for them) how can they take admonition or repent if We were to remove the torment from them; and it is also said: how can they take admonition or repent if We were to destroy 575 them at Badr; and it is also said: on the Day of Judgement, (when a messenger) Muhammad (pbuh) (making plain (the Truth)) in a language they understand (had already come unto them,
